ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: bitz 53 cleric , fv, rp server
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Faronia my name is Dabruiser Troll and I was thinking about making a mage but before I do I have some general questions: 1. What race do you recommend
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Faronia my name is Dabruiser Troll and I was thinking about making a
mage but before I do I have some general questions: 1. What race do you
recommend for playing a mage? 2. Where do you get the componet(s) needed
for pet spells? and 3. What is the mage epic? Thanks for any help you can
give me! Happy Hunting!

Dabruiser Troll 29th Warrior
Xatrok Hellraiser 25th Necromancer

-----Original Message-----
From: Renee [mailto:rkbhalf@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 05, 2003 3:37 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: bitz 53 cleric , fv, rp server


Hello Bitz,

My name is Faroina Mavenfire and I am an Arch Mage of the 61st
season. I believe that I have seen you on FV before in the PoK.
Anyway, if I see you on, or if you see me, please feel free to say hi.

And that goes for everyone else that reads this too =).

If y'all ever need any help or have questions I may be able to help
out.

Good luck to all and hope to see you soon.

~Faroina Mavenfire~



--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Gina Peterson" <gina@m...> wrote:
> > Just a note to say hello to you all, I hope there are some of the
FV
> > server players on, maybe we can run into each other sometimes,
nice
> > to meet you all.
> > Bitz
>
>
> Hello Bitz!
>
> I play on FV! My one and only. :-) Pathfinder of 52 seasons, and
always
> happy to make a new friend. Maybe we'll run into each other!
>
> ~Kyndara Silverleaf~
> Pathfinder of Karana,
> Firiona Vie
> <Circle of Sisters>
